= about grub2 =

grub2 can generate /boot/grub/grub.cfg from /etc/default/grub.cfg and /etc/grub.d/

and We can custom another boot items from /etc/grub.d/40_custom

and /etc/default/grub.cfg seems using to do more general job, like the background of grub, the resolution of grub and etc.
